name: SamFetch
description: A Web API to download firmwares from Samsung servers without any restriction.

SAMFETCH_HIDE_TEXT.description: Only 0 or 1. Set the value to 1 if you don't want the help text.

SAMFETCH_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description: Sets the "Access-Control-Allow-Origin" header value. Settings this to "*" (wildcard) allows all domains to access this SamFetch instance. Default is set to "*".

SAMFETCH_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Specifies how many bytes must read in a single iteration when downloading the firmware. Default is set to 1485760 (1 megabytes)
